content.title: How I Work
paragraphs: I believe in a practical, no-nonsense approach to service design. While I take my work seriously, I don't take myself too seriously.
My process is collaborative and transparent. I work closely with stakeholders to understand their needs and constraints, then design solutions that are both innovative and implementable.
I'm not just a designer - I'm a strategist, researcher, and facilitator. I help organizations build the capacity to design better services themselves.
